attributes.additional_details:
If open gym. Limited people in and out at a limited time, should not be able to open gyms fully. 

But please don’t close them.
attributes.background:
Keep Gyms open, even if it’s appointment only limited to two hours per day if with a Personal Trainer.
Gyms Help to maintain mental health as well as fitness. I help disabled people to become abled

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869
